name: Grader - Photo Rating Network
description: Grader is the new cool social tool that lets you rate the photos of your friends using a sliding scale (1-10) and instantly upload your own pics to give ratings, get ratings and make the Grade! Just snap a shot, add text or toss in a hashtag- or upload your image solo- and youre In!   This free download means access to our global Grader network that allows you to finally express your real feelings and actual opinions on our 1-10 sliding scale. And its not only a superfun social game but also a neat app to play with as you share photos of yourself, your fashion, your designs, your day and every photographic moment that shines the light of YOU BEING YOU!  And lets face it, likes and dislikes are broke. Instead of those tired old time-wasters, find out what all your friends- and the rest of the world- really think of your look, your style and all your wildest, weirdest photos when you play the Grader game. Your feedback is instant and continuously updated so that you can easily track your progress, along with everyone elses! And its all vice-versa, of course And rememberits also all anonymous until you decide otherwise. We bet making grades was never this much fun!   - Anonymously rate your friends & followers photos with a simple slider on a universal 1-10 scale, then see what theyre thinkingand saying - Get instant feedback on all your photo uploads along with continuous updates on all your grades - Add text for captions or hashtags to simplify all your followers searches and play with an array of filters to add a dash of spice to all your shots  - Auto-view the most popular photos on the continuously updated Grader network - Get a closer, drill-down view on all the stats (age, gender, region, etc.) of everyone who viewed your photos to see what theyre all about - Use Grader as a handy tool to express yourself or simply as a fun game to play with your current friends, all while you meet new people and make all new friends around the world - The Grader Secret- No one gets to comment on anyones pics until/unless they first grade a photo themselves! You gotta get In before you fit In fellow Graders, so get busy, get snapping and jump in the mix!  Aim High, Score Higher with Grader!
